line.text: O me what eyes hath love put in my head
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which have no correspondence with true sight
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Or if they have where is my judgment fled
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That censures falsely what they see aright
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: If that be fair whereon my false eyes dote
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: What means the world to say it is not so
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: If it be not then love doth well denote
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Love eye is not so true as all men no
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: How can it O how can love eye be true
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That is so vexed with watching and with tears
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: No marvel then though I mistake my view
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The sun it self sees not till heaven clears
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: O cunning love with tears thou keep me blind
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Lest eyes well-seeing thy foul faults should find
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
